alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 5:48PM MST until December 08 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches primarily above 7000 feet and 1 to 2 inches possible in the lower mountain-valleys. Winds gusting to 35 MPH at times. * WHERE...The Central Mountains west of Challis and Mackay and north of Hailey, including but not limited to Banner Summit, Stanley, Galena Summit, Ketchum, Sun Valley, and Clayton. * WHEN...Until 3 AM Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over mountain passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
